item.title: Blues playlist for 12/2011
item.description: Including: B.B. King, Black Dub, Blues Cello, Buddy Guy, Gary Clark Jr, Muddy Waters, Robert Johnson, Skip James, Son House, Stevie Ray Vaughan.

item.title: Blues playlist for 11/2011
item.description: Including: B.B. & The Blues Shacks, Clifton Hicks, Daniel Norgren, Gary Clark Jr., Indigenous, John Lee Hooker, Robert Belfour, Robert Petway, Scott H. Biram, Tommy Emmanuel.

item.title: Blues playlist for 10/2011
item.description: Including: Big Bill Broonzy, Blind Willie Mctell, Frankie, I Shall Not Be Moved, John Mayer, Lord, Send Me An Angel, Muddy Waters, Paul Butterfield Band, The Dead Weather, Tom Waits.

item.title: Blues playlist for 9/2011
item.description: Including: "Too Many Dirty Dishes", Albert King, B.B King, Dock Boggs, Freddy King, Gary Clark Jr., Junior Kimbrough, New Found Soul, Reverend Gary Davis, The Derek Trucks Band.

item.title: Blues playlist for 8/2011
item.description: Including: Black Snake Moan, Blind Willie Mctell, Jack O'Diamond, Mademoiselle Nobs, Pacific Gas And Electric, R.L. Burnside, Seasick Steve, Sister Rosetta Tharpe, Stevie Ray Vaughan, White Stripes.

item.title: Blues playlist for 7/2011
item.description: Including: Blind Willie Johnson, Cowboy Bebop Ost 1, Joe Bonamassa, Love In Vain, Steve Gannon.

item.title: Blues playlist for 6/2011
item.description: Including: Canned Heat, Charley Patton, Don'T Leave Me, Guitar Lesson, Joe Callicott.

item.title: Blues playlist for 5/2011
item.description: Including: Adele, Burnside Exploration, Geeshie Wiley, Gil Scott-Heron, J.B. Lenoir, Magic Sam, Willie Brown.

item.description: Including: Afroamerican Prison Song, Cw Stoneking, Gary Moore W Albert King, Hugh Laurie, Johnny Hoodoo, Jonny Lang, Peter Green, Screamin' Jay Hawkins, Son House, White Stripes.
